entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to a few rain showers near noon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
